HomePage.title: Hello world! its ofek !!!
HomePage.heroDescription: Master new skills efficiently with personalized AI tutoring, adaptive learning paths, and interactive exercises.
HomePage.featuresSubtitle: Our platform combines cutting-edge AI technology with proven educational methodologies to deliver an unparalleled learning experience.

aiTutoring.title: AI-Powered Tutoring
aiTutoring.description: Get personalized help from our advanced AI tutors that adapt to your learning style and pace.

learningPaths.title: Customized Learning Paths
learningPaths.description: Follow learning paths designed specifically for your goals, skills, and preferred learning methods.

progressTracking.title: Progress Tracking
progressTracking.description: Monitor your advancement with detailed analytics and progress reports to optimize your learning.

collaborativeLearning.title: Collaborative Learning
collaborativeLearning.description: Connect with peers and participate in group exercises to enhance your understanding through collaboration.

HomePage.testimonialsSubtitle: Thousands of learners have transformed their educational journey with our AI learning platform

testimonial1.quote: The AI tutoring has completely transformed how I approach difficult topics. It's like having a personal tutor available 24/7.
testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.quote: As an educator, I've seen firsthand how this platform adapts to different learning styles. My students are more engaged than ever.
testimonial2.name: Michael Chen

testimonial3.quote: The customized learning paths helped me acquire new skills at my own pace, and the progress tracking kept me motivated throughout.
testimonial3.name: Aisha Patel

HomePage.ctaNoCredit: No credit card required. Cancel anytime.

SignupPage.formSubtitle: Create your account to start learning
SignupPage.fullNameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
SignupPage.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
SignupPage.welcomeSubtitle: Join thousands of learners enhancing their skills with our platform.
SignupPage.feature1Desc: AI-tailored content based on your learning style
SignupPage.feature2Desc: Engaging content that adapts to your progress
SignupPage.registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Please check your email to confirm your account before logging in.

LoginPage.formSubtitle: Sign in to continue your learning journey
LoginPage.welcomeSubtitle: Continue your personalized learning experience with AI assistance.

Analytics.pageDescription: Track your progress and identify areas for improvement
Analytics.authRequired: Please sign in to view analytics
Analytics.selectWorkspacePrompt: Please select a workspace from the sidebar to view your analytics.
Analytics.noWorkspacesYet: You don't have any workspaces yet. Create one to get started.
Analytics.noDataText: No analytics data is available for this workspace yet. Complete some quizzes to see your performance analytics.
Analytics.noDataHint: Try taking quizzes on different subjects to track your progress and see detailed analytics here.
Analytics.keepTakingQuizzes: Keep taking quizzes to improve your tracking
Analytics.takeQuizzesToStart: Take quizzes to start tracking subjects
Analytics.noWeakAreas: No weak areas identified yet. Keep taking quizzes!
Analytics.noStrengths: No strengths identified yet. Keep taking quizzes!
Analytics.notEnoughData: Not enough data to display performance charts. Complete more quizzes to see detailed analytics.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Workspace
deleteDialog.message: You are about to delete this workspace. This action cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.warning: This will permanently delete the workspace and ALL related data including subjects, quizzes, files, and other content.
deleteDialog.confirmationQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?

QuizGeneration.selectFile: Select a file to generate questions from
QuizGeneration.enterTopic: Enter a topic for the quiz
QuizGeneration.topicPlaceholder: e.g., Data Structures, World War II, Cognitive Psychology
QuizGeneration.questionCountError: Number of questions must be between 1 and 20
QuizGeneration.additionalInstructionsTooltip: Your instructions will be given high priority in the quiz generation process
QuizGeneration.instructionsPlaceholder: e.g., 'Focus on theoretical concepts', 'Include at least 2 coding questions', 'Make questions about specific sections...'
QuizGeneration.pastExamTooltip: Include a past exam to guide the AI in creating questions with similar patterns
QuizGeneration.includePastExam: Include a past exam as reference
QuizGeneration.noPastExams: No past exams available. Please upload past exams in the Files section first.
QuizGeneration.pastExamDescription: Select a past exam to help the AI generate questions that follow a similar pattern and style.
QuizGeneration.subjectsTooltip: Click on a subject to toggle high priority. High priority subjects (blue) will be focused on in the quiz. Remove a subject with the X button.
QuizGeneration.noSubjects: No subjects available. Create subjects in your workspace first.
QuizGeneration.subjectsClickInstructions: Click on a subject to mark it as high priority (blue). High priority subjects will be focused on in the quiz.
QuizGeneration.quizGeneratedMessage: Your quiz "{title}" with {count} questions has been created.
